/**

\mainpage Overview

SBRT_Lung, an ITK based implementation.

"Radiomics Analysis of Lung Cancer‚Äù calculates quantitative imaging measures including Intensity statistics, Gray Level Co-occurrence Matrix (GLCM), Gray Level Run-Length Matrix (GLRLM), Local Binary Patterns (LBPs), and shape features from PET/CT scans of lung cancer patients for predicting clinical outcomes, such as treatment response and patient survival using pattern recognition and machine learning techniques.

*/
